48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah [may Allah be pleased with him] narrated that:The Prophet said: “when you hear the crowing of the roosters, then ask Allah of His bounty, for verily they have seen an angel. When you hear the braying of a donkey, then seek refuge in Allah from Shaitan, [the rejected] for, verily, it has seen a Shaitan.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا سَمِعَ نَهِيقَ الْحِمَارِ،
chapter.eng-name: What One Says When Hearing The Braying Of A Donkey
